bioText.p: Hoping to silence skeptics wondering if President Obama had ever shot a gun, the White House released a photo of him skeet shooting at Camp David
NBC’s Peter Alexander reports and NBC’s Chuck Todd offers analysis.

text.p: Hoping to silence skeptics wondering if President Obama had ever shot a gun, the White House released a photo of him skeet shooting at Camp David ut the image has only stirred up more controversy in the gun control debate. NBC’s Peter Alexander reports and NBC’s Chuck Todd offers analysis.

caption.p: Hoping to silence skeptics wondering if President Obama had ever shot a gun, the White House released a photo of him skeet shooting at Camp David
but the image has only stirred up more controversy in the gun control debate. NBC’s Peter Alexander reports and NBC’s Chuck Todd offers analysis.
